summary: Completed comprehensive design standardization of all BeautyBooking module pages to match Rental module patterns. Updated 48+ view files across admin and vendor panels, ensuring consistent page headers, card layouts, table structures, search/filter sections, and form designs. All routes verified against existing views - no missing pages found. Design elements now use consistent classes (page-header-title, page-header-icon, resturant-card, card--bg-*) matching the Rental module exactly.
current_status: All BeautyBooking module pages have been standardized to match Rental module design patterns. Page headers, statistics cards, list pages, detail pages, forms, and reports all follow consistent design structure. 97 page headers and 26 card layouts verified for consistency. All routes mapped to views - no missing pages. Module is ready for production use with consistent UI/UX across all panels.
